00017 class VgaBuf {
00018 public:
00019     LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE4  dd_buf;
00020     DDSURFACEDESC2      buf_des;
00021     BOOL            buf_locked;                   // whether the and back buffers have been locked or not.
00022     short*         cur_buf_ptr;
00023     char            is_front;                     // whether it's the front buffer or not
00024 
00025     // ------- temp_unlock --------- //
00026     // char                                             save_locked_flag;
00027     UCHAR           lock_stack_count;
00028     WORD            lock_bit_stack;
00029 
00030     //--------- back buffer ----------//
00031 
00032     short* buf_ptr()          { return cur_buf_ptr; }
00033     short* buf_ptr(int x, int y)  { return (short *)((char *)cur_buf_ptr + buf_des.lPitch*y) + x; }
00034 
00035     // pitch in pixel
00036     int   buf_pitch() {                           // in no. of pixel
00037         return buf_des.lPitch >> 1;
00038     }
00039 
00040     // pitch in byte
00041     int   buf_true_pitch()      { return buf_des.lPitch; }
00042 
00043     int buf_size()          { return buf_des.dwWidth * buf_des.dwHeight * sizeof(short); }
00044     int   buf_width()         { return buf_des.dwWidth; }
00045     int   buf_height()            { return buf_des.dwHeight; }
00046 
00047     //---- GUI colors -----//
00048 
00049     static short color_scheme;                    // color scheme, set by set_color()
00050 
00051     static char color_light;                      // color of the light panel side
00052     static char color_dark;                       // color of the dark panel side
00053     static char color_up;                         // color of up_panel surface
00054     static char color_down;                       // color of down_panel surface
00055     static char color_push;                       // color of pushed button surface
00056     static char color_border;                     // color of color
00057 
00058     static short *default_remap_table;            // new for 16-bit
00059

00062     ~VgaBuf();
